name: MedicationManagementADLOrIADL
title: Medication Management (ADL or IADL)
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of medication management (ADL/IADL) ability.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's ability to manage medications as an adl/iadl.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Medication Management (ADL or IADL).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Medication Management (ADL or IADL).)

contains.display: Medication management.oral medications - most dependent performance during the past month [CMS Assessment]
Medication management.inhalant/mist medications - most dependent performance during the past month [CMS Assessment]
Medication management.injectable medications - most dependent performance during the past month [CMS Assessment]
Medication management.oral medications - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Medication management.inhalant/mist medications - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Medication management.injectable medications - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
